item.description:
SALSA FOR $5! At JOEL MASSICOT'S SALSA DVD RELEASE PARTY

Join us for another night of salsa dancing and the official release of Joel Massicot's long awaited DVD Release!

PARTY ENTRANCE ONLY $5!!!

Date: Saturday, September 22

Time: 8pm-12am

Beginner/Intermediate Salsa Lesson: 8-9pm

Music: DJ Rob

Performance: TBA

Entrance: ONLY $5!

Capacity is only 350! So get there early!

Location: Knights of Columbus; 75 West School St.; Charlestown, MA 02129

T accessible! (Orange Line - Community College Stop)

-------------------------------------
Joel's DVD Info

"Music Interpretation 101 for Salsa Dancers"

Drawing upon his 23 years experience in music, Joel will help you understand how to break down melodies to rhythms, rhythms to counts, and counts to steps.

DVD is for dancers of ALL Levels, On 1 and On 2! DVD includes:

- Pulse Explanation
- Timing Exercises
- Clave Explanation
- Variations of Clave
- 5 Footwork Patterns! (Taught on 2)
-Bonus Features

DVDs will be on sale for $35!

Or Pre Order yours through Paypal today! Visit the site for more information:

http://masacoteentert...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Party for $5!
